title: ‘Revolver,’ Newly Expanded, Shows the Beatles at a Creative Peak
description: A five-disc set reveals a band awash with musical and sonic ideas, having fun and making breakthroughs.
dc:creator: Jon Pareles
media:description: From left: George Harrison, Paul McCartney, Ringo Starr and John Lennon of the Beatles in 1966, the year they released “Revolver.”
